recipies package

Submodules

recipies.models module

class recipies.models.Post(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

This class represents a recipe in our blog app.

Attributes: :param title: The main title for the recipe. :type: Character text field max length of 140. :param body: The body text of the recipe. :type: Character text field. :param signature: Signature added to the end of every recipe blog entry. :type: Character text field max length of 140. :param date: Date the blog recipe entry was captured. :type: Datetime.
